label: Build & Run: SnapCharts
command:
set -e && \
BUILD_DIR=$(xcodebuild -project '/Users/williamspiegel/Documents/nativeIOSApps/SnapCharts/SnapCharts.xcodeproj' -scheme 'SnapCharts' -destination 'id=E74C2902-99ED-4E09-A7A6-A49216CDA03E' -showBuildSettings 2>/dev/null | grep -m1 'BUILT_PRODUCTS_DIR' | sed 's/.*= //') && \
APP_NAME=$(xcodebuild -project '/Users/williamspiegel/Documents/nativeIOSApps/SnapCharts/SnapCharts.xcodeproj' -scheme 'SnapCharts' -destination 'id=E74C2902-99ED-4E09-A7A6-A49216CDA03E' -showBuildSettings 2>/dev/null | grep -m1 'FULL_PRODUCT_NAME' | sed 's/.*= //') && \
echo "ðŸ”¨ Building SnapCharts..." && \
(xcodebuild -project '/Users/williamspiegel/Documents/nativeIOSApps/SnapCharts/SnapCharts.xcodeproj' -scheme 'SnapCharts' -destination 'id=E74C2902-99ED-4E09-A7A6-A49216CDA03E' build 2>&1 | xcbeautify || xcodebuild -project '/Users/williamspiegel/Documents/nativeIOSApps/SnapCharts/SnapCharts.xcodeproj' -scheme 'SnapCharts' -destination 'id=E74C2902-99ED-4E09-A7A6-A49216CDA03E' build) && \
echo "ðŸ“² Installing on simulator..." && \
xcrun simctl install 'E74C2902-99ED-4E09-A7A6-A49216CDA03E' "$BUILD_DIR/$APP_NAME" && \
BUNDLE_ID=$(xcodebuild -project '/Users/williamspiegel/Documents/nativeIOSApps/SnapCharts/SnapCharts.xcodeproj' -scheme 'SnapCharts' -destination 'id=E74C2902-99ED-4E09-A7A6-A49216CDA03E' -showBuildSettings 2>/dev/null | grep -m1 'PRODUCT_BUNDLE_IDENTIFIER' | sed 's/.*= //') && \
echo "ðŸš€ Launching $BUNDLE_ID..." && \
xcrun simctl launch 'E74C2902-99ED-4E09-A7A6-A49216CDA03E' "$BUNDLE_ID"
